node.statement: (Asymptotic decoupling estimate) Under rho_eps = (Y_eps/Z_eps') P with W_eps = exp(2 delta_m_eps^2 X_eps), X_eps = <psi_eps, Phi_eps>, for every bounded continuous G: |Cov_{rho_eps}(G, W_eps)| / E_{rho_eps}[W_eps] -> 0 as eps -> 0. Uses Gaussian decomposition, Wick orthogonality, quartic subordination, and Laplace concentration.
